Regulation Name(s): Culture medium for antimicrobial susceptibility tests
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Spectra™ VRE chromogenic medium to detect vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus colonization in gastrointestinal specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of gastrointestinal colonization with vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus faecium and Enterococcus faecalis using rectal swab and fecal specimens to aid in VRE prevention and control in healthcare settings; not for diagnosis or monitoring of VRE infection
